scene_description_enriched: An angel with blonde hair and large wings, wearing a red robe, flies in a blue sky. Below, two men stand in a landscape dotted with stylized trees. The man on the left wears a blue cloak over a green robe and holds a staff. The man on the right wears a blue tunic, hat, and red hose, gesturing with his hands. In the background, a red walled city with towers and domes is visible, set against a brown, hilly landscape.
